alfredsnippet.snippet:
(cont'd)

None of these specialist groups are responsible for synthesizing together their conclusions, yet each group publishes their own conception of what our culture was like.

Would you believe it?

That is exactly the situation with Stonehenge.  The people who built these monuments also carved petroglyphs in rocks.  And they also told stories about mythological archetypes.
alfredsnippet.name: WIP - Fragmented Specialist View of the Pagans - Part 2
